vlive.korean: [다은의 취향 저격 발포주 고래 캔으로 결정] 고래? [They decide on the whale as Daeun suggested] The whale? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남녀가 술 마실 때 옆에 앉으면 일어나는 일 (feat. 취중진담)ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP7
vlive.english: [They decide on the whale as Daeun suggested] The whale?

vlive.korean: 구분이 안 되니까 발포해서 다 죽이라고 해요. couldn't tell them apart. So they decided to shoot them all. 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 목] 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!

vlive.korean: 가위바위보 해서 발포 비타민이라는 걸 먹었어요. We played rock paper scissors and I ate a fizzy vitamin tablet. 듣기 View video WINNER : [REPLAY] WINNER OUR TWENTY FOR MIDSUMMER NIGHT LIVE
vlive.english: We played rock paper scissors and I ate a fizzy vitamin tablet.

vlive.korean: 원래 발포비타인은 물 500mL랑 해서 먹어야죠. - 희석해서 먹어야죠. You need to dissolve it in 500ml of water. - By diluting it. 듣기 View video WINNER : [REPLAY] WINNER OUR TWENTY FOR MIDSUMMER NIGHT LIVE
vlive.english: You need to dissolve it in 500ml of water. - By diluting it.

vlive.korean: 발포비타민, 비타민 많이 드셨나봐요 머리색이. You bought vitamin C tablets. It seems like you had a lot of vitamin C. Your hair color tells us. 듣기 View video STAR PROJECT : '별프로젝트'프리마켓 메인이벤트 생중계
vlive.english: You bought vitamin C tablets. It seems like you had a lot of vitamin C. Your hair color tells us.
